scenario.name: voip_probe_call_out
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:{{TARGET_NUMBER}}@{{SIP_DOMAIN}} SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "{{CALLER_ID}}" <sip:{{CALLER_ID}}@{{SIP_DOMAIN}}>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:{{TARGET_NUMBER}}@{{SIP_DOMAIN}}> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: <sip:{{CALLER_ID}}@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 8 101 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-16 a=sendrecv

INVITE sip:{{TARGET_NUMBER}}@{{SIP_DOMAIN}} SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "{{CALLER_ID}}" <sip:{{CALLER_ID}}@{{SIP_DOMAIN}}>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:{{TARGET_NUMBER}}@{{SIP_DOMAIN}}> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 INVITE Contact: <sip:{{CALLER_ID}}@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Authorization: [authentication username="{{SIP_LOGIN}}" password="{{SIP_PASSWORD}}"] Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 8 101 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-16 a=sendrecv

ACK sip:{{TARGET_NUMBER}}@{{SIP_DOMAIN}} SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "{{CALLER_ID}}" <sip:{{CALLER_ID}}@{{SIP_DOMAIN}}>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:{{TARGET_NUMBER}}@{{SIP_DOMAIN}}>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 ACK Contact: <sip:{{CALLER_ID}}@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:{{TARGET_NUMBER}}@{{SIP_DOMAIN}} SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "{{CALLER_ID}}" <sip:{{CALLER_ID}}@{{SIP_DOMAIN}}>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:{{TARGET_NUMBER}}@{{SIP_DOMAIN}}>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 3 BYE Contact: <sip:{{CALLER_ID}}@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
